OOC: Once again, oops.  I misread.

::Aerotaur::
    He looks at his feet and scuffs one in the dirt.  "I agree.  I don't want 
to have to train Trinity, but she is always running out into battle.  Then 
people have to put themselves at risk to save her.  With a little training 
maybe she wouldn't run out into battle.  At least that's what I hope..."  He 
looks up into the sky, watching the clouds overhead.  "I know that training 
is risky.  That's why I'm going to supervise it.  I can't let her get hurt."
